integron.com

Modular front-end HTML, CSS and JavaScript for Creative Cherry

Led a team of two to build the HTML, CSS and JavaScript for this extensive site for a large corporate client.

I devised and implemented a modular CSS methodology that successfully minimized the front-end complexity of a site with 24 unique templates (I have a presentation ready to give on the same subject). This modularization, together with an iterative ("agile") delivery and QA process, ensured that there were almost no unexpected changes to make or bugs to fix after the initial development period. The client's DotNetNuke CMS development team were able to deliver the project on time.

  • HTML5
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • Velocity JS
  • Grunt
  • PHP (as a template language)
  • Front-end
